title: Trump Organization Launches Trump Mobile Cell Phone Service
description: The Trump Organization unveiled a mobile phone plan and a $499 smartphone that is set to launch in September, with the new service being dubbed Trump Mobile. What do you think? The post Trump Organization Launches Trump Mobile Cell Phone Service appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: The Trump Organization unveiled a mobile phone plan and a $499 smartphone that is set to launch in September, with the new service being dubbed Trump Mobile. What do you think?
text: The Trump Organization unveiled a mobile phone plan and a $499 smartphone that is set to launch in September, with the new service being dubbed Trump Mobile. What do you think? “Sorry, I’m locked in a two-year cell contract with Kim Jong-Un.” David Rupert, Lunch Orderer “If the founding fathers didn’t want presidents to sell phones named after themselves, they would’ve said so.” Nabil Amjadi, Egg Pickler “I’ve fallen for too many Trump scams to not also fall for this one.” Abby Salazar, Suede Marketer Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. html:
The Trump Organization unveiled a mobile phone plan and a $499 smartphone that is set to launch in September, with the new service being dubbed Trump Mobile. What do you think?

“Sorry, I’m locked in a two-year cell contract with Kim Jong-Un.”

David Rupert, Lunch Orderer

“If the founding fathers didn’t want presidents to sell phones named after themselves, they would’ve said so.”

Nabil Amjadi, Egg Pickler

“I’ve fallen for too many Trump scams to not also fall for this one.”

Abby Salazar, Suede Marketer

Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. Get The Onion Newsletter.
